item.title: Customising the fields shown in Airtable's Calendar .ics export
item.description: Airtable is a rather wonderful tool. It powers the program creation backend process for Kafka Summit and Current. It does, however, have a few frustrating limitations - often where it feels like a feature was built on a Friday afternoon and they didnâ€™t get chance to finish it before knocking off to head to the pub.
